titleStmt.title: The odes of Casimire translated by G.H.
titleStmt.author: Sarbiewski, Maciej Kazimierz, 1595-1640.
Hills, G., translator.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Humphrey Moseley, at the signe of the Princes Armes in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With additional engraved [by W.M. sculp.] title page that lacks "for T.W." in the imprint.
A translation, by G. Hills, of the original by Maciej Kazimierz Sarbiewski.
In English and Latin on facing pages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
